1. To access the game, you need to download and open it.
2. If it asks you to search the app store or anything similar, say no.
3. If it says "Windows Protected Your PC", click "More info", then "run anyway".
4. Last, if the game starts but then crashes, email me and I will try to fix the problem.

For the game,

1. Use the left and right arrow keys to move around.
2. Use the down arrow key to pause.
3. Use the up-arrow key to jump.
4. Use the spacebar to shoot.
